description: After taking a screenshot with Snagit's capture tools, you can add text, arrows, callouts, and other annotations to that screenshot. Many of these annotations can be themed, to ensure they appear with a consistent color scheme and style.

For example, if you plan to add both text and an arrow to a screenshot, you can select the Industrial theme and use its presets to ensure both elements use the same color and style. You can also use themes across multiple images, to ensure elements appear consistently in all those images.
